title: Apple has seeded iOS 15.4 Release Candidate, here’s what’s new
content:
Apple has seeded the Release Candidate (RC) of iOS 15.4, following the release of beta 5 last week. Unlike iOS 15.3, iOS 15.4 comes packed with new features, changes, and additions. These include support for Face ID when masked for iPhone 12 and newer models, new emoji, updates to Keychain, and much more. To download

The post Apple has seeded iOS 15.4 Release Candidate, here’s what’s new appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple has seeded iOS 15.4 Release Candidate to developers. This version of iOS comes packed with changes, including new emoji.
